sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE ESACDGL( SYS_ID VARCHAR(18), LANG_CD VARCHAR(18), GRP_CD VARCHAR(18), GRP_CD_NM VARCHAR(60), REM VARCHAR(128), STS CHAR(1), REG_ID VARCHAR(18), REG_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), MOD_ID VARCHAR(18), MOD_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), CONSTRAINT ESACDGL_PK PRIMARY KEY ( SYS_ID, LANG_CD, GRP_CD ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'ESACDGL' , 'SYS_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'ESACDGL' , 'LANG_CD', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'ESACDGL' , 'GRP_CD', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'ESACDGL' , 'GRP_CD_NM', 'VARCHAR', 60 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'ESACDGL' , 'REM', 'VARCHAR', 128 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'ESACDGL' , 'STS', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'ESACDGL' , 'REG_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'ESACDGL' , 'REG_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'ESACDGL' , 'MOD_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'ESACDGL' , 'MOD_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'SYS_ID', '시스템 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'LANG_CD', '언어 코드 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'GRP_CD', '그룹 코드 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'GRP_CD_NM', '그룹 코드 명 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'REM', '비고 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'STS', '상태 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'REG_ID', '등록자 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'REG_DT', '등록 일시 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'MOD_ID', '수정자 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'MOD_DT', '수정 일시 ' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( SYS_ID ,LANG_CD ,GRP_CD ,GRP_CD_NM ,REM ,STS ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CHK_USER', '사용자 체크', NULL, 'C', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 17:26:00', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 17:28:00' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CONF', '환경설정', NULL, 'C', 'GE001037', '2022-08-29 17:03:33.0 Asia/Seoul', NULL, '2022-08-29 17:03:33.0 Asia/Seoul' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDGL B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.LANG_CD = A.LANG_CD AND B.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD
SELECT * FROM ESACDGL WHERE GRP_CD IN ('CHK_USER', 'CONF')
